reviewtext: Mine is older than dirt, now serving as a backup. It has proven itself to be reliable, sturdy (except for the flip-open cover) and easy to use. Of course, the software available is incredibly diverse, making this a very useful tool in business, travel and entertainment (egs. financial spreadsheets, airline schedules, 100s of games). I get months out of 2 AAA batteries, even with frequent use of the easy to read backlighting for the screen. I would say that you cannot go wrong with the PalmIII, though the price makes other brands/models worth considering too.
